mapper.sql: id, comm_pub_id, avai_supply_count, meas_unit_id, spec, net_weight, start_ord_expres, price_expres, version_num, transaction_amount, sales_volume, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag
mapper.select: select id, comm_pub_id, avai_supply_count, meas_unit_id, spec, net_weight, start_ord_expres, price_expres, version_num, transaction_amount, sales_volume from level_spec_quote where comm_pub_id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND del_flag = '0'
mapper.insert:
insert into level_spec_quote (id, comm_pub_id, avai_supply_count,meas_unit_id, spec, net_weight, start_ord_expres,price_expres, version_num, transaction_amount, sales_volume, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.commPubId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.avaiSupplyCount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{item.measUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{item.spec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.netWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{item.startOrdExpres,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.priceExpres,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.versionNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.transactionAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.salesVolume,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM level_spec_quote WHERE meas_unit_id = #{id} AND del_flag = '0'
mapper.insert: insert into level_spec_quote (id, comm_pub_id, avai_supply_count, meas_unit_id, spec, net_weight, start_ord_expres, price_expres, version_num, transaction_amount, sales_volume, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{commPubId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{avaiSupplyCount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{measUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{spec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{netWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{startOrdExpres,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priceExpres,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{versionNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transactionAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{salesVolume,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR})

id,

mapper.update:
update level_spec_quote
comm_pub_id = #{commPubId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
avai_supply_count = #{avaiSupplyCount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
meas_unit_id = #{measUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
spec = #{spec,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
net_weight = #{netWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
start_ord_expres = #{startOrdExpres,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price_expres = #{priceExpres,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
version_num = #{versionNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
transaction_amount = #{transactionAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
sales_volume = #{salesVolume,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update level_spec_quote set comm_pub_id = #{commPubId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, avai_supply_count = #{avaiSupplyCount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, meas_unit_id = #{measUnitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, spec = #{spec,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, net_weight = #{netWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, start_ord_expres = #{startOrdExpres,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price_expres = #{priceExpres,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version_num = #{versionNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transaction_amount = #{transactionAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, sales_volume = #{salesVolume,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id id, comm_pub_id commPubId, avai_supply_count avaiSupplyCount, meas_unit_id measUnitId, spec spec, net_weight netWeight, start_ord_expres startOrdExpres, price_expres priceExpres, version_num versionNum, transaction_amount transactionAmount, sales_volume salesVolume from level_spec_quote where del_flag = '0'

select id id, comm_pub_id commPubId, avai_supply_count avaiSupplyCount, meas_unit_id measUnitId, spec spec, net_weight netWeight, start_ord_expres startOrdExpres, price_expres priceExpres, version_num versionNum, transaction_amount transactionAmount, sales_volume salesVolume from level_spec_quote where del_flag = '0' and id = #{id}

SELECT t2.id AS level_spec_quote_id, t3.memb_id AS seller_id, t2.spec AS comm_spec, t2.comm_pub_id, t2.net_weight, mm.meas_unit_name AS meas_unit, t2.version_num AS levelVersion, t2.price_expres AS price, t2.start_ord_expres, t2.avai_supply_count, t3.comm_title, t3.comm_state_type, t3.ser_type_expres, t3.stalls_mage_id, t3.version_num AS commVersion,
t4.id AS stallsMageId, t4.base_name, t4.address, t4.base_type, t5.place_origin_name, t6.cont_tel AS cont_tel, t6.conter AS contacts,
t4.id AS stallsMageId, t4.stalls_name, t4.whole_sale_market_id, t4.stalls_house_num, t4.contacts, t4.cont_tel, t4.business_date, t4.business_time, t4.address,
s1.name as prov, s2.name as cou, s3.name as city from level_spec_quote t2 left join comm_pub_info t3 on t3.id = t2.comm_pub_id
LEFT JOIN base_info t4 ON t4.id = t3.base_id LEFT JOIN place_origin_mage t5 ON t5.id = t4.abroad_id LEFT JOIN entp_auth t6 ON t6.memb_id = t3.memb_id AND t6.del_flag = '0' AND t6.auth_state_type = '3'
left join stalls_mage t4 on t4.id = t3.stalls_mage_id
left join meas_unit_mage mm on mm.id = t2.meas_unit_id left join sys_area s1 on s1.code = t4.area_prov left join sys_area s2 on s2.code = t4.area_cou left join sys_area s3 on s3.code = t4.area_city where t2.del_flag = '0' and t3.del_flag = '0'
and t2.id in (${importIds})

SELECT t1.id AS level_spec_quote_id, t2.memb_id AS seller_id, t1.spec AS comm_spec, t1.comm_pub_id, t1.net_weight, t1.sales_volume, t1.transaction_amount, t1.version_num AS levelVersion, t1.price_expres AS price, t1.start_ord_expres, t1.avai_supply_count, t2.comm_title, t2.comm_state_type, t2.base_id, t2.stalls_mage_id, t2.ser_type_expres, t4.whole_sale_market_id, t3.meas_unit_name AS meas_unit, t3.dimensions_type, t2.version_num AS commVersion FROM level_spec_quote t1 LEFT JOIN comm_pub_info t2 ON t2.id = t1.comm_pub_id left join stalls_mage t4 on t4.id = t2.stalls_mage_id left join meas_unit_mage t3 on t3.id = t1.meas_unit_id WHERE t1.del_flag = '0' AND t2.del_flag = '0' and t1.id = #{id}
